ComicInfo.Summary:
It’s MAD’s yearly recap of the 20 dumbest people events and things! Featuring Miley Cyrus, President Obama, A-Rod, Paula Deen and Blurred Lines, there’s plenty of stupidity to go around! Plus our full-spoof of “The Following,” Planet Tad, The MAD Strip Club, Sergio Aragonés' MAD Look at Sleepovers, The Fold-In and much, more. Buy it today – it’d be pretty dumb not to!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-12-11 23:29:01. [Issue ID 438127]
